import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; function Checkout() { const location = useLocation(); const cart = location.state?.cart || { items: [] }; return (
Checkout

Cart Items: {cart.items.length}

{cart.beat?.map((beat, index) => (
{beat.title}
{beat.duration.slice(3)}
{beat.bpm}
{beat.tags}
))}
); } export default Checkout;
